Link to sample part: See https://hackaday.io/project/11951/log/39222-under-the-dome and https://hackaday.io/project/11951/log/39533-more-dome-stuff for more info on choosing a dome.

Component name: Flat black spray paint for plastic
Link to sample part: http://amzn.to/28U2jSy or http://www.homedepot.com/p/Rust-Oleum-Painter-s-Touch-2X-12-oz-Flat-Black-General-Purpose-Spray-Paint-249127/202246266 or equivalent. Make sure it has a ''flat'' or ''matte'' finish, and is compatible with plastic.

Component name: Cree 3W star white LEDs, neutral white or cool white (48 for domes 12-14''D, 56 for domes 15-17''D, 64 for domes >= 18''D)

Comments: Any shiny black sphere will do, e.g. black marble or ball bearing dipped in ink. Must be at least 250 pixels in diameter in photograph taken with dome, so larger domes may require larger spheres (e.g. black pool balls, obsidian spheres).

Component name: Cat5e 24 AWG Ethernet patch cable (positive voltage => red)
Cat5e 24 AWG Ethernet patch cable (ground connection => your choice of color)

Link to sample part: Color to match dome; http://amzn.to/28LRf9q or equivalent
